key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on the Asia-Pacific region
Industry cyclicality tied to semiconductor demand fluctuations
Integration risks from the $6.5 billion acquisition of CMC Materials
Legal scrutiny, including a lawsuit under the Toxic Substances Control Act (TSCA)
controversies: Lawsuit related to chemical reporting obligations under TSCA
environmental_issues: Need to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 42% by 2030
Compliance with stringent environmental regulations for high-purity materials production
social_issues: Potential reputational damage from legal and ethical concerns
governance_issues: Challenges in aligning operations, cultures, and technologies post-CMC acquisition
